fields.headline: University guide 2021: Bournemouth University
fields.bodyText: Fees Currently £9,250 for full-time home students. Overseas (including EU) students pay £14,100 - £15,000, depending on the course they study. Fees for part-time courses are charged at half of the full-time rate for each level of study. Bursaries and scholarships There are a range of non-repayable awards on offer, including an Academic Excellence Scholarship worth £1,000 for students who achieve AAA or above at A-level (or equivalent). A BU Maintenance Bursary of up to £2,400 and a Care Leavers Bursary was available for 2020-21 entry. A full list of funding available can be found on the BU website. Accommodation A room is guaranteed to all first year students who have submitted their UCAS application by the relevant deadlines and hold an Unconditional Firm offer of study at BU. Current prices range from £104-134 per week for a single room in a self-catered, shared house to £169 per week for a room with an en-suite, and a shared kitchen and living area.. All prices include bills. Contact Tel: +44 (0)1202 961916 Email: futurestudents@bournemouth.ac.uk Web: bournemouth.ac.uk Accommodation: bournemouth.ac.uk/accommodation Twitter: @bournemouthuni Facebook: facebook.com/JoinBournemouthUni YouTube: youtube.com/user/bournemouthuni Instagram: bournemouthuni LinkedIn: linkedin.com/school/bournemouth-university/
